paper_abstract: The fixed points of the belief propagation decoder for non-binary low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes are referred to as stopping constellations. In this paper, we give the stopping constellation distributions for the irregular non-binary LDPC code ensembles defined over the general linear group. Moreover, we derive the exponential growth rate of the average stopping constellation distributions in the limit of large code-length.
paper_title: Analysis of Stopping Constellation Distribution for Irregular Non-binary LDPC Code Ensemble
